## What was done
Briefly describe the changes made.

Example:
- Added POST /appointments endpoint
- Created Service and Repository layers
- Implemented schedule conflict validation


## Why
Explain the motivation or business reason behind this change.

Example:
Allow users to create medical appointments through the API.


## How to test
Steps to validate the changes:

- Run the application
- Open Swagger UI
- Call the endpoint(s)
- Verify expected behavior


## Evidence (optional)
Screenshots, curl commands, logs, requests/responses, etc.


## Checklist
- [ ] Code compiles
- [ ] Tested locally
- [ ] No warnings
- [ ] Tests passing
- [ ] Follows project standards
- [ ] No breaking changes (or documented if any)
